title: paripakkuvam taruvAi
sahitya:
paripakkuvam taruvAi paranE pArAmal ulagaip-pArttirukkum shAnta


anupallavi

  aridAna inda nara jIvanattai amara jIvanamAi Akki inburavE


caraNam    siddha yOgavarar tatvamasi ennum tirumantirattin poruLai uNarndE 
shuddha jyOti jIvan muktanAgi enrum sutantaramAna padam tanil vAzhap-
